A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was meant to be a sequel to Force Awakens... It WASN'T!
It was meant to set up Episode IX... It DIDN'T!

It completely ignored all the questions from its FAR better predecessor. 
Then it proceeded to leave the film in a total mess for JJ to clear up.
For a start\, they killed the wrong Skywalker! If Leia had died instead of Luke\, the next film wouldn't be in such a tight spot. Now\, with Carrie gone\, they'll have to give her an off screen death (which wd be more dignified than CGI ala. Tarkin).  
 
ITS TIME.... FOR THE FRANCHISE... TO DIE!
